title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.39 - Ordering by special agreement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.39 - Ordering by special agreement

State Regulations

Where on any pier or terminal or in any area or section
there exists a special agreement concerning the preferential order of hiring of
gangs or of employees as individuals, such agreement shall be submitted in
writing to the commission by the joint board established by the New York

Shipping Association, Inc. and the International Longshoremen's Association. If
the commission determines that such agreement is not inconsistent with the laws
of the United States, the laws of the States of New York and New Jersey and the
objectives of the Waterfront Commission Act, such preferential order of hiring
may be instituted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
